organisation_name: Alerta-Mente: Associação Nacional para a Saúde Mental (Alerta-Mente)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: The National Association for Mental Health - Alerta-Mente - is a non-profit organization that aims to directly support families of people suffering from mental disorders. It also aims to promote the National Debate so that mental health can be included in all public, private, international, national and regional policies.
relevant_communication:
Alerta-Mente is currently developing a programme with the Portuguese private sector focusing on Mental Health at workplaces.  
 
We are contacting the private sector and structuring a pool with key questions that will allow us to understand the macro picture in terms of mental health at the workplace.  
 
Subsequently we will tackle the common answers/ problems by approaching these private sector companies to address those mental health issues, possibly through a conference with experts that will be available to explain the stigma associated with mental health problems and the best way to prevent and tackle these.
